heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, providing clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your healing journey.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your journey.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred plant medicine from the Amazon, known for its powerful healing and psycho-spiritual properties. It is a decoction made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna plant (Psychotria viridis). This brew has been used for centuries by indigenous tribes for healing, divination, and spiritual growth.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine facilitates a deep introspective journey, allowing access to repressed emotions, traumas, and unconscious patterns. It can provide profound insights, emotional release, and a sense of connection to oneself and the universe. The experience is often described as a 'rebirth' or a 'reset' of one's psychological and spiritual state.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Plant as a Spiritual Master
spiritualMasterDescription: In many traditions, Ayahuasca is considered a master teacher plant. It is believed to possess its own intelligence and spirit, guiding individuals through their healing process. The plant teaches through visions, insights, and direct experiences, helping to reveal the root causes of suffering and offering paths to liberation.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and direction in life, gaining clarity on personal and professional paths.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It helps release deep-seated emotional blockages, trauma, and negative patterns, leading to greater emotional freedom.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often report a profound sense of connection to nature, the universe, and their own spiritual essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a supportive group setting, these ceremonies foster a sense of community and shared healing. The collective energy can amplify the individual experience, creating a powerful container for transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, private ceremonies offer a one-on-one setting with our guides, tailored to your specific intentions and needs.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this moment.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan available for up to 10 people
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% down payment.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.

finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the main list but it can be reactivated later. Are you sure?
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced and compassionate guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information and profile picture.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, receive inspiring content, and be part of a community dedicated to healing and spiritual growth.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its sacred origins, and its transformative potential.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the facilitators who create a safe and supportive space for your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key. Discover our recommendations for diet, mind, and spirit.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our complete history of past, present, and future events.

themeTabDescription: Adjust the application's colors. Values are in HSL format (e.g., '125 33% 74%').
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I am contacting you from 'El Arte de Sanar'. We invite you to fill out our pre-ceremony questionnaire to begin your preparation process. You can access it here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the health and intention questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat.
noConversationsFound: No chat conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the spiritual guide of 'El Arte de Sanar'. How can I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive personalized guidance.
tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour to get you started. First, could you provide your phone number? This helps us stay in touch.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We'll use this for important communications regarding ceremonies.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories from our past ceremonies. Get a feel for the experience!
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: This is where you'll find our scheduled ceremonies. Click to see details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Now, let's fill out a brief questionnaire. This is an essential step to ensure your safety and help us guide you better.
preparationPageTitle: Your Guide to a Transformative Journey
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins weeks before, with a special diet and mental focus.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The night of connection, where the medicine reveals its wisdom.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound journey of introspection, healing, and discovery.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you bring the lessons learned into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A clean body allows for a clearer experience. We recommend starting this diet at least one week before.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like rice, quinoa, and oats
Legumes such as lentils and beans
Herbal teas and plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList: Fermented foods (aged cheeses, soy sauce, etc.)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Align your mind and spirit with your intention for healing.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open your heart.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write it down.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and feelings in the days leading up to the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is a safe space to confront and release stored emotions. It's common to experience both joy and sadness. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. Our guides are here to support you through every moment of your process.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Comfort is key to a positive experience. Here's what we recommend.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, layered clothing (it can get cold)
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList: A change of clothes for the morning
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and helps us ensure a safe and supportive experience for you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs) or other psychoactive drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications you are currently taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of psychiatric conditions such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or psychosis?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or worked with other psychoactive substances before?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony? What are you hoping to heal, understand, or achieve?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what brings you to this medicine...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been successfully submitted.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved. The next important step is to review the preparation guide to ensure you are ready for the journey.
